metas.name: War Dogs
metas.description: Combines dark comedy with a war setting, similar to Three Kings and Inglourious Basterds.

metas.name: Snatch
metas.description: A British crime comedy with a fast-paced plot and memorable characters, reminiscent of Get Shorty.

metas.name: Zombieland
metas.description: Blends horror and comedy effectively, in line with 28 Days Later and some of the user's more comedic horror choices.

metas.name: Children of Men
metas.description: A dystopian thriller with elements of science fiction and social commentary, aligning with their enjoyment of 28 Weeks Later and The Running Man.

metas.name: Looper
metas.description: A sci-fi thriller with a clever plot and action elements, similar to The Running Man but with a time travel twist.

metas.name: Prisoners
metas.description: A dark and suspenseful thriller with strong performances, fitting with their appreciation for suspenseful dramas like The Shawshank Redemption.

metas.name: Arrival
metas.description: A thought-provoking science fiction film with a strong narrative and emotional depth, for fans of intelligent sci-fi.

metas.name: Source Code
metas.description: A fast-paced sci-fi thriller with a mind-bending plot, providing suspense and action.

metas.name: Edge of Tomorrow
metas.description: Action-packed sci-fi with a Groundhog Day-esque twist, similar to The Running Man but with more humor.

metas.name: In Bruges
metas.description: A dark comedy with crime elements and witty dialogue, reminiscent of Get Shorty but with a European setting.

metas.name: Seven Psychopaths
metas.description: Another dark comedy from the director of In Bruges, with crime and eccentric characters.

metas.name: The Nice Guys
metas.description: A comedic crime thriller with great chemistry between the leads, similar to Get Shorty.

metas.name: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
metas.description: A clever and witty neo-noir action comedy, fitting with their appreciation of comedy-thrillers.

metas.name: Shaun of the Dead
metas.description: A classic horror-comedy with British humor, appealing to fans of 28 Days Later and comedic elements.

metas.name: Hot Fuzz
metas.description: Another Edgar Wright film blending action and comedy, with a mystery element.

metas.name: The World's End
metas.description: The final film in the Cornetto trilogy, combining sci-fi and comedy with the same team behind Shaun of the Dead and Hot Fuzz.

metas.name: Train to Busan
metas.description: A tense and action-packed zombie thriller from South Korea, appealing to horror and thriller fans.

metas.name: I Saw the Devil
metas.description: A dark and violent South Korean thriller with a compelling revenge story, fitting with their appreciation for thrillers.

metas.name: Memories of Murder
metas.description: A critically acclaimed South Korean crime thriller with elements of dark humor, a hidden gem.

metas.name: The Chaser
metas.description: Another intense South Korean thriller with a fast-paced plot and suspenseful atmosphere.

metas.name: No Country for Old Men
metas.description: A neo-western crime thriller with a dark tone and suspenseful atmosphere.

metas.name: Sicario
metas.description: A tense and gritty thriller with a focus on the drug war, sharing similar themes with The Hurt Locker.

metas.name: Hell or High Water
metas.description: A modern western with crime and drama elements, featuring strong performances and a compelling story.

metas.name: Wind River
metas.description: A crime thriller set in a Native American reservation, with a focus on mystery and suspense.

metas.name: The Departed
metas.description: A crime thriller directed by Martin Scorsese, with a star-studded cast and a complex plot.

metas.name: Parasite
metas.description: A critically acclaimed South Korean black comedy thriller with social commentary, matching various genres they enjoy.

metas.name: Shutter Island
metas.description: A psychological thriller with a twist ending, directed by Martin Scorsese.

metas.name: The Machinist
metas.description: A dark and disturbing psychological thriller with a strong lead performance.

metas.name: Predestination
metas.description: A mind-bending sci-fi thriller with time travel elements, appealing to fans of complex plots.

metas.name: Primer
metas.description: An extremely low-budget but highly intelligent time travel film, a hidden gem for sci-fi fans.

metas.name: Brick
metas.description: A neo-noir mystery set in a high school, with clever dialogue and a unique style.

metas.name: The Guest
metas.description: A thriller with action and horror elements, featuring a mysterious and charismatic protagonist.

metas.name: You're Next
metas.description: A horror film with a clever twist and strong female lead, fitting with their enjoyment of horror thrillers.

metas.name: Green Room
metas.description: A tense and brutal thriller with horror elements, set in a punk rock venue.

metas.name: Upgrade
metas.description: A violent and stylish sci-fi action thriller, with a revenge plot and a unique visual style.

metas.name: District 9
metas.description: A sci-fi film with social commentary and action elements, similar to Children of Men but with aliens.

metas.name: Snowpiercer
metas.description: A dystopian sci-fi thriller with a unique premise and strong performances.

metas.name: Brazil
metas.description: A dystopian science fiction black comedy film directed by Terry Gilliam.

metas.name: The Lobster
metas.description: A bizarre and darkly comedic dystopian film, with a unique premise and thought-provoking themes.

metas.name: Triangle
metas.description: A psychological horror/thriller that plays with time loops and mystery.
